address2: Block C No. 2 Lize Zhonger Road Chaoyang District
longBusinessSummary: Waterdrop Inc., through its subsidiaries, provides online insurance brokerage services to match and connect users with related insurance products underwritten by insurance companies in the People's Republic of China. The company offers short-term health and long-term health and life insurance products and services. It also operates a medical crowdfunding platform. Waterdrop Inc. was founded in 2016 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Guang  Yang
